sentences.sentence: Most expensive item: 60,000 yuan (marten fur coat).
sentences.translation: 最昂贵单品：6万元(貂皮大衣)。

sentences.sentence: This is the most narrow street in Stockholm, by the name of Marten Trotzigs Grand.
sentences.translation: 这是斯德哥尔摩最狭窄的街道。叫做马汀佗兹小道。
